bibdata.title: Draft American National Standard Guide for Electrostatic Discharge Test Methodologies and Acceptance Criteria for Electronic Equipment
Draft American National Standard Guide for Electrostatic Discharge Test Methodologies and Acceptance Criteria for Electronic Equipment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This ANSI ESD guide provides expanded explanations, best practices, and guidance for avoiding the pitfalls associated with ESD testing to IEC and other international ESD standards and should be considered a supplement to these standards, rather than a replacement. It also includes unique ESD test procedures related to connecting charged peripherals to equipment in use.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
